member.name: F:Quantum.Editor.QuantumUnityDBUtilities.AssetLabel
member.summary: Label applied to Quantum AssetObject assets.

member.name: M:Quantum.Editor.QuantumUnityDBUtilities.GetGlobalDBPath
member.summary: Returns the default path to the asset.

member.name: M:Quantum.Editor.QuantumUnityDBUtilities.RefreshGlobalDB(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Refreshes the global Quantum Unity DB. If is false, an update will only happen if the hash calculated with assets under label has changed. If is true, a refresh will be performed regardless.

member.name: M:Quantum.Editor.QuantumUnityDBUtilities.SetQuantumUnityDBRefreshMode(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the Quantum Unity DB refresh mode. By default, after an asset with is imported, a call to is scheduled. When running in batch mode, it may result in the hash never being refreshed and the global not being updated. To prevent this, call this method with set to true.
member.param: Should be called immediately after an asset import.

member.name: M:Quantum.Editor.QuantumUnityDBUtilities.ExportAsJson
member.summary: Export the global DB to a JSON file. A dialog is shown to select the file.
member.returns: if a file was selected and saved into.

member.summary: Export the global DB to a JSON file with . None of the asset will have its called, as they are loaded with .

member.name: M:Quantum.Editor.ReflectionUtils.GetFieldIncludingBaseTypes(System.Type,System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Type)
member.summary: Normal reflection GetField() won't find private fields in parents (only will find protected). So this recurses the hard to find privates. This is needed since Unity serialization does find inherited privates.

member.name: T:Quantum.Editor.QuantumEditorMenuDllToggle
member.summary: A static utility class that enabled Unity menu methods to toggle Quantum Debug and Release dlls by extracting a zip archive and overwriting the libraries. In earlier versions this was handed by the QUANTUM_DEBUG define and multiple version of dlls but the Quantum.Engine.dll has internal MonoBehaviours that lose the script guids this way.

member.summary: Checks if the Debug version of Quantum.Engine.dll is being used.

member.summary: Checks if any of the Quantum DLLs are NOT Debug. Use this to check if needs to be called in order to switch to Debug.
member.returns: true if either Quantum.Deterministic or Quantum.Engine.dll are NOT Debug. false otherwise.

member.summary: Extracts the Debug versions of Quantum DLLs in the specified directory.

member.name: M:Quantum.Editor.QuantumEditorMenuDllToggle.SetToReleaseCheck
member.summary: Checks if any of the Quantum DLLs are Debug. Use this to check if needs to be called in order to switch to Release.
member.returns: true if either Quantum.Deterministic or Quantum.Engine.dll are Debug. false otherwise.
